name: Iron Sting
r1: Dealing Elemental DMG increases all DMG by 8% for 6s. Max 2 stacks. Can only occur once every 1s.
r2: Dealing Elemental DMG increases all DMG by 10% for 6s. Max 2 stacks. Can only occur once every 1s.
r3: Dealing Elemental DMG increases all DMG by 12% for 6s. Max 2 stacks. Can only occur once every 1s.
r4: Dealing Elemental DMG increases all DMG by 14% for 6s. Max 2 stacks. Can only occur once every 1s.
r5: Dealing Elemental DMG increases all DMG by 16% for 6s. Max 2 stacks. Can only occur once every 1s.
